short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to export X/Twitter list member and follower list to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape and Extract members and followers list from any X/Twitter list, and then save the list member user information to a CSV/Excel/JSON file.

HOW TO USE?
1. Input the URL of a Tweet list.
2. Click the start button.

FEATURES

âœ”ï¸Ž Retrieve user's websites, first name, and last name fields. You can identify emails using domain and name with some email hunters.
âœ”ï¸Ž Support X.com and Twitter.com links.
âœ”ï¸Ž Save export history to local storage.
âœ”ï¸Ž Resume task progress from saved history.

X/TWITTER TOOLS FAMILY
You can access other Twitter tools from the Tools page by clicking on the menu.
- TwDM - Auto Send DM for Twitter
- TwScraper - Export followers and following
- TwSearch - Export search results to CSV

ðŸ‘‹ FAQ

TWList utilizes the Twitter website to fetch list members & followers. Due to website limitations, Twitter may not always display all data on the site.

For more information: https://twlistexport.extensionsfox.com/#faq
For any inquiries, please contact us at help@extensionsfox.com.

ðŸ”’ DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed on your local computer, never passing through our web server, ensuring privacy. No one else can access the data you save.
